update wxb

update wxb set gid = #{gid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wstate = #{wstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlicense = #{wlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wkname = #{wkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wpheno = #{wpheno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wleix = #{wleix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wkaidate = #{wkaidate,jdbcType=DATE}, wyudate = #{wyudate,jdbcType=DATE}, wwandate = #{wwandate,jdbcType=DATE}, wjiedate = #{wjiedate,jdbcType=DATE}, kprice = #{kprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wb1 = #{wb1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wb2 = #{wb2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wb3 = #{wb3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wb4 = #{wb4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wb5 = #{wb5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wb6 = #{wb6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wb7 = #{wb7,jdbcType=INTEGER} where wid = #{wid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `wxb` AS a JOIN `jcb` AS b ON a.`wid` = b.`id` ORDER BY `wstate`
SELECT * FROM `wxb` where wstate = 2 or wstate = 4

mapper.update: UPDATE `wxb` SET wstate = 3 , wb3 = #{fglx},wb4=#{yy} WHERE wid=#{wid}
